CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Perishable Goods relative to Seasonal Facilities?
SRP.A: Perishable Goods is {above} Seasonal Facilities in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Seasonal Facilities relative to Perishable Goods?
SRP.A: Seasonal Facilities is {below} Perishable Goods in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total warehouse utilization?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Perishable Goods}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total warehouse utilization?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Seasonal Facilities}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Seasonal Facilities's minimum Warehouse Utilization in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Seasonal Facilities's minimum Warehouse Utilization is in {2018}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Seasonal Facilities's maximum Warehouse Utilization in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Seasonal Facilities's maximum Warehouse Utilization is in {1996}.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2020, was the average total Warehouse Utilization higher or lower than between 2004 and 2012?
NC.A: The average total warehouse utilization between 2006 and 2020 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2011 and 2014, did the total Warehouse Utilization experience a larger or smaller change than between 2001 and 2002?
NC.A: The change in total warehouse utilization between 2011 and 2014 was {larger} than between 2001 and 2002.

NC.Q: Was the total Warehouse Utilization in 1997 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total warehouse utilization in 1997 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Was the total Warehouse Utilization in 2010 higher or lower than in 2018?
NC.A: The total warehouse utilization in 2010 was {higher} than in 2018.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Perishable Goods} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Perishable Goods and Seasonal Facilities first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Perishable Goods and Seasonal Facilities did not exchange leading positions.
